meanings.definition: The act of abutting or the state of being abutted.
meanings.sent1: The abuttals of the two properties touched each other.
meanings.sent2: The fence served as the abuttals between the two yards.
meanings.sent3: The abuttals of the puzzle pieces made it challenging to fit them together.
meanings.sent4: The abuttals of the mountains created a majestic landscape.
meanings.sent5: The abuttals of the Lego blocks clicked together perfectly.

meanings.definition: A boundary or structure that abuts another.
meanings.sent1: The abuttals of the sidewalk met the edge of the road.
meanings.sent2: The stone wall acted as the abuttals for the garden.
meanings.sent3: The abuttals of the bookshelf held up the books neatly.
meanings.sent4: The abuttals of the buildings formed a continuous line along the street.
meanings.sent5: The abuttals of the puzzle pieces fit snugly against each other.
